p:
Another study from the same group used self-collected saliva from deep throat by COVID-19 patients, tested 2019-nCoV RNA, and analyzed temporal profile of 2019-nCoV load.
12 From this study, saliva mixed with nasopharyngeal and bronchopulmonary secretions from deep throat was collected by coughing out in the morning.
12 Among 23 COVID-19 patients included for this study, 20 cases of their saliva showed detectable 2019-nCoV RNA.
12 In the temporal profile of viral load, saliva reached the peak of viral load during the first week of symptom onset and then declined.
12
